summary: Discover a kingdom of humans underneath Skyrim with their own history, culture, and conflict.
descriptionHtml:
As Blackreach was under utilized for such an amazing and awesome place, I decided to begin transforming it into a separate kingdom and world all it's own.
The Kingdom underground is in dire straits as it is facing famine and war.

Little more than a new city with some backstory, the mod will expand and gradually become it's own world.
author: Ivarmiland
